price: Kuma da rãnar da Allah Yake cẽwa, "Ku kirãyi abõkan tarayyãTa, waɗanda kuka riya." Sai su kirãye su, sai bã zã su karɓa musu ba, kuma Mu sanya Maubiƙa* (Mahalaka) a tsakãninsu,
arabic: وَيَوۡمَ يَقُولُ نَادُواْ شُرَكَآءِيَ ٱلَّذِينَ زَعَمۡتُمۡ فَدَعَوۡهُمۡ فَلَمۡ يَسۡتَجِيبُواْ لَهُمۡ وَجَعَلۡنَا بَيۡنَهُم مَّوۡبِقٗا
footnotes: * Maubiƙã sũnan wani rãfi ne na wuta, asalinsa daga 'Wabiƙa,' wãtau yã halaka. Za a sanya wannan rãfi a tsakãnin mãsu bin Shaiɗan da sũrõrin gumãka, da wanda ya shirya musu gumãkan, sunã bauta musu.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: wayawma yaqūlu nādū shurakāiya alladhīna zaʿamtum fadaʿawhum falam yastajībū lahum wajaʿalnā baynahum mawbiqan
